author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Copper to PEX tips…I deburr and apply water soluble flux to the pipe/fitting. I only apply heat to the pipe for a few seconds. Then I focus the heat on the PEX A adapter. Once the solder melts, I remove the heat. Capillary action pulls solder into the joint for a watertight seal. I let that cool then do the PEX A installation 🔥
title: Copper to PEX Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #diy
